text: brane protein-associated neurodegeneration ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of mitochondrial membrane protein-associated neurodegeneration:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Mitochondrial Membrane Protein-Associated Neurodegeneration  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Neurodegeneration with Brain Iron Accumulation Disorders Overview  - Genetic Testing Registry: Neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation 4  - Spastic Paraplegia Foundation: Treatments and Therapies   These resources
